person.persName: Samuel Rorer (Hopkins County postmaster and examiner)

body.p: A Virginia-born, Kentucky farmer and public servant. Married to Josephine Rorer. Served as a Hopkins County postmaster for Hazel Dale District in 1842 and Underwood District in 1850. Served as Examiner for Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1865. Member of the Masonic Order at Madisonville Lodge, No. 143.
